attributes.action: change the law to ensure that no expenses paid to MP's other than the basics are repaid
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A panel of members of the public should sit, similar to jury duty to invigilate the expenses of MP's in all future occasions and the past expenses should all be passed to HM Revenue and Customs to be scrutinised to the full.  Any MP found guilty of make fraudulent or excessive claims to be charge and fined.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
